name: Collection - USEC
description: Hello there, mercenary. Eliminate USEC PMC group and bring me their dogtags. After that, I'll start new rumors about you, something more interesting.
success_message: Welcome back, merc. Hand over the dogtags, I'll pass them to where they need to be.

missions.message: Eliminate 10 USEC PMC operatives all over the Tarkov territory
Hand over the 10 found in raid USEC PMC dogtags
